import React from 'react'; import circle from "../assets/contacts/circle.png" import bar from "../assets/contacts/bar.png" import lineimg from "../assets/contacts/lineimg.png" function HowItWorks() { return (

Contact Us

Head Office:

H.no-3-11-368/Flat no; 401, 4th
Floor, above old Indusind
Finance Bank, Back side of Axis
Bank, L.B Nagar, Hyderabad,
Telangana 500068

Contact us:

Email- truridetaxi@gmail.com
Helpline No. +91 9346467553
-truridetaxi.com

); } export default HowItWorks;
